content:
Take only pictures, leave only footprints.

I’m coming back after 1 month of absence in Instagram with this photo of mine taken in Paris, France.

Sure 1 month is a long time when you’re only resting, but if you’re using that time to travel, rest, and see something new…you’re not only resting your mind, you’re resting your soul.

Sometimes we as creators get burned out, overwhelmed, and swamped by work, and all we need sometimes is just a little time off.

I’ve been away for the last month of 2022 traveling around Europe. I used this time to reflect everything that has been going on in 2022, all the good things, all the bad things, the easy and the hard things.

And now, 1 month later I feel refreshed, like a completely recharged and different person, and that’s what traveling does to you, it recharges your soul.

You see new things, new cultures, new places, new people and all those are like reading a new book!

So I advise any creator and solopreneur out there to take some time off and travel as much as you can, wherever you can!

And I wish you a happy 2023 🎊🎉🥳 May this year be full of joy, success, and happiness for you and your families🙏💜

Yours,
Gent💜 - rewrite andmake it better
